price: 44. Allah fait alterner la nuit et le jour. Il y a certes là un enseignement pour ceux qui savent voir.
arabic: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wal-nahāra inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri
